title: Low priority for stupid reasons
body: So i got a low priority which is like 20mins wait for 5 times. For the stupidest reason for example, my computer's graphics card crashed and i had to restart my computer and i got a low pior for it like wtf riot. You're just wasting 1 hour of someone's life for no ass reason. Just get rid of the low pior thing cuz its too unfair. And also why i quited lol.

replies.body:
You don't get a 20 minute LPQ for a first leave/dodge, it requires a consistent history of leaving/dodging and almost always requires **both** a 5 minute and 10 minute LPQ prior, except in extreme cases.

Sucks that it happened *in this instance* because of something out of your control, but that's what happens when you repeatedly break the rules.

Actually, it is possible to get LPQ as a result of only one leave. However, [it mainly happens in ranked games](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q3), as they are treated more harshly than any other mode. 

Rest of your answer is on point.
i think he means of this magnitude

You don't get low priority q if you dodge once. You have dodged more than once and that caused you to receive a low priority q. Maybe sending in a support ticket if you really think you don't deserve the low priority q. Just send ONE ticket and not many or else sending multiple tickets can cause longer response time.

After a placement in LPQ the only way to get out is to wait out the time, even if the initial leave was out of your control.

>**CAN YOU TAKE ME OUT OF LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?**
No. We will not take your account out of low priority queue under any circumstances.
[(SOURCE)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q6)
